nodeList.nodeDescription: Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

nodeList.description: Soul Feast has increased cast speed and costs less mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [5%] increased cast speed and mana efficiency.

node.nodeDescription: Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

node.description: Soul Feast has a chance to grant you the {Haste} buff, granting you 30% increased movement speed for 4 seconds, and {Soul Fragments} return to you faster.
node.nodeDescription: Fragmented Souls return to you [25%] faster per point. You have a [5%] chance per point to gain Haste on casting Soul Feast.

node.description: Soul Feast has a chance to chill enemies for a duration.
node.nodeDescription: Enemies who have been hit by Soul Feast are chilled for [2] seconds per point.

node.description: Soul Fragments grant increased ward, but Soul Feast deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Reduces damage dealt by [15%] per point and increases the ward gained from Soul Fragments by [25%] per point.

node.description: {Soul Fragments} grant more ward.
node.nodeDescription: Soul Fragment grant [1] additional ward per point.

Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

nodeList.description: Soul Feast deals damage in a larger area.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [20%] increased area of effect per point.

node.description: Soul Feast no longer requires targets to be Cursed and no longer has a target limit, but now hits all enemies a small cone in front of you.
node.nodeDescription: Soul Feast no longer requires targets to be marked for death. Hits enemies only in a small cone in front of you.

node.description: Soul Feast has increased cast speed and costs less mana.
node.nodeDescription: [5%] increased cast speed and mana efficiency.

Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

node.nodeDescription: Fragmented Souls return to you [25%] faster per point. You have a [5%] chance per point to gain Haste on casting Soul Feast.

node.description: Soul Feast has a chance to chill enemies for a duration.
node.nodeDescription: Enemies who have been hit by Soul Feast are chilled for [2] seconds per point.

node.description: Soul Fragments grant increased ward, but Soul Feast deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Reduces damage dealt by [15%] per point and increases the ward gained from Soul Fragments by [25%] per point.

node.description: {Soul Fragments} grant more ward.
node.nodeDescription: Soul Fragment grant [1] additional ward per point.

Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

nodeList.description: Soul Feast deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but {Soul Fragments} grant less ward.

node.nodeDescription: Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

nodeList.description: Soul Feast costs less mana and can hit more targets.

node.description: Soul Feast deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but {Soul Fragments} grant less ward.

node.nodeDescription: Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

nodeList.description: Soul Feast has a chance to poison enemies.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [10%] chance per point to poison on hit.

node.nodeDescription: Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

nodeList.description: Casting Soul Feast grant you a chance to poison enemies for 4 seconds, but also inflicts you with poison.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
You are afflicted with [1] stack[s] of poison when you cast Soul Feast.

When you hit an enemy with Soul Feast, you gain +[7%] poison chance per point for 4 seconds.

node.description: Soul Feast has a chance to poison enemies.
node.nodeDescription: [10%] chance per point to poison on hit.

Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

nodeList.description: {Soul Fragments} grant more ward.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Soul Fragment grant [1] additional ward per point.

node.nodeDescription: Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

nodeList.description: Soul Feast has a chance to cause enemies to bleed.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Soul Feast has a [10%] chance per point to inflict Bleed on hit.

node.description:
Soul Feast's base necrotic damage is converted to physical damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to physical damage, but not increases to necrotic damage.

{Soul Fragments} now restore health instead of granting ward. The health restored is equal to the ward you would have been granted.
node.nodeDescription:
Soul Feast deals physical damage and restores health instead of granting ward. 

The health restored is equal to the ward you would gain and scales with your increased healing effectiveness.

node.description: {Soul Fragments} grant more ward.
node.nodeDescription: Soul Fragment grant [1] additional ward per point.

Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

nodeList.altText:
{Frenzy} grants 20% increased attack and cast speed. Does not stack.

Damned is a stacking ailment that lasts for 3 seconds, deals 25 base Necrotic damage and reduces targets health regeneration by 20% per stack.
nodeList.description: When you kill a {Damned} enemy with Soul Feast, you have a chance to grant your minions {Frenzy} for 3 seconds.

node.altText: Damned is a stacking ailment that lasts for 3 seconds, deals 25 base Necrotic damage and reduces targets health regeneration by 20% per stack.
node.description: Soul Feast inflicts enemies with {Damned}.
node.nodeDescription:
Targets hit by Soul Feast are Damned.

Damned causes enemies to take necrotic damage over time for [3] seconds per point.

node.nodeDescription: [5%] increased cast speed and mana efficiency.

node.nodeDescription: Soul Fragment grant [1] additional ward per point.

Feasts on the souls of all enemies marked for death, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing a fragment of each of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 5 ward when they reach you.

stats.statName: Minion Frenzy Chance On Damned Kills

nodeList.altText: Damned is a stacking ailment that lasts for 3 seconds, deals 25 base Necrotic damage and reduces targets health regeneration by 20% per stack.
nodeList.description: When you kill a {Damned} enemy with Soul Feast, they have a chance to reanimate as a {Soul Wisp} under your control, which last for 10 seconds.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Enemies slain while Damned have a [5%] chance per point to reanimate as a Soul Wisp under your control. These minions last for 10 seconds.

node.altText: This increases both the damage of Damned and its reduction to health regen.
node.description: {Damned} inflicted by Soul Feast has increased effectiveness.

nodeList.altText:
{Blood Tether} is a spell that attaches to an enemy, drawing blood from them to deal physical damage over time. 25% of the damage dealt is leeched as health.

An enemy cannot have more than one tether at a time. Tethers last 5 seconds.
